review: Helpful, but doesn't yield much more functionality for me beyond that of the amazon app that comes preloaded on my vizio tv. I really got it because I felt the amazon games could make the $100 black box worthwhile but alas, game selection is pathetic and lame. Not to mention the price of the sold separately game controller. Perhaps if the game quality and selection improves I could recommend this, but as it is now I would say save your money and get a dedicated gaming system.

review: Excellent product. I've been looking for a way to take advantage of Amazon Prime video and this was the answer! Loved it so much I cancelled my Netflix subscription. I don't use the rental feature but I have noticed it is cheaper then Comcast.I own a Chromecast, Apple TV, and Boxee Box and the Fire TV is the best!ProsAmazon Prime Video integration is excellent, you can search by actor, genre, etc. Voice Search is also extremely handySleek LookRemote w/voice search is excellent1080pGreat Wifi ReceptionXBMC compatible (with a little work) - this replaced any need for a home theater PCEasy SetupConsRestricted to Amazons App Store.Not many good appsNo in menu way to turn it off or restart it.Doesn't come with a controller (added cost)No way to really filter just Prime Videos
